name: storekit
description: A powerful toolkit plugin for WooCommerce. Powered by WordPress.

scripts.makepot: wp i18n make-pot --domain='storekit' --exclude='node_modules,vendor' . --headers='{"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://github.com/wpintegrity/storekit/issues/new/choose"}' --file-comment="Copyright (c) $(date +'%Y') WPIntegrity. All Rights Reserved." languages/storekit.pot
scripts.release: composer i && composer du -o && npm run build && npm run makepot && npm run version && npm run zip

author: WPIntegrity
